title: 【搬运】Blanc Maison de Ville | Wok-城市白色房屋
author: 筒子
txt_content:
Blanc Maison de Ville | Wok地图发行时间为2015/15/3

本作的亮点在于空间的利用和花纹的合理分配外观看起来非常的小，而内部空间却非常的细致有意思希望大家可以喜欢这个建筑下面是作者的原话Welcome to the Blanc Maison de Ville! A Versailles Inspired 3,420 sqft French Baroque Townhome, Built as the Second  Avalon Morrisetti Custom home on the World of Keralis Server!    

This Lavish 5 Story French Baroque Townhome Sports 2 Bedrooms each with their own Ensuite and Closet, A 2 Story Open Foyer with Staircase directly to Living Room, An Indoor Pool, A Dining room and an Oversized Kitchen. All the Rooms are Oversized to give the illusion of much more space than there actually is. a Private Parking Space is Reserved on the back for Residents. Custom Winding Staircases Flow along the back of the house Costing nearly 2 million dollars alone in Labor and Materials. Exquisite Furnishings, and Top of the line Appliances and fixtures all come together to create the one and only Blanc Maison De Ville. 开始一大波预览图了














想学内饰的同学可以下载这个地图来学习
地图不大但是真的非常的细致

replies.author: 恶魔-潇洒
replies.txt_content: 这……内饰有的我居然看不出来是用什么改造的！
